reviewText: Great DVD.  Enjoyed seeing the midgets again as I used watch my uncle race these cars in the 40's and 50's.  Mel Anthony----what a classic.

I bought this video mainly due to it having track roadster footage... but all in all i thought it sounded good... it lived up to my expectations... great video about a great guy

the only complaint is that you have to go one by one through all the special features rather then a "play all" feature.... but that is not really even worth mentioning

if you like old oval track racing and vintage racing from now... check it out!
